module module¶

Module¶

Basic simulation modules

class module.Module[source]¶

Bases: object

Defines a generic simulation module, implementing some basic functionalities that all modules should inherit from

__init__()[source]¶

Constructor. Gets simulation instance for scheduling events and automatically assigns an ID to the module

get_id()[source]¶

Returns module id

get_type()[source]¶

Returns module type

handle_event(event)[source]¶

This function should be overridden by inheriting modules to handle events for this module. If not overridden, this method will throw an error and stop the simulation

initialize()[source]¶

Initialization method called by the simulation for each newly instantiated module
